name: Maze Farming Simulator 2018
description:
Rapture yourself with a puzzle solving game with agricultural farming tasks to complete in a labyrinth maze puzzle. In this Game Farming Simulator you can Plant, grow, harvest, and sell five different crops, raise cows and sheep, and sell woodland at your own pace. Lead this farming with your expert plowing crop skills and become the modern farmer of this village.

Take direct control of harvesters and tractors and manage your growing farm from the full screen management folder. You have access to your fields by harvesting them in time and harvest. The aim of this game is to produce pure, sterling and whole natural foods.

Grow new child or cross-breed crop on your farm and prove yourself the best farmer of the world. You can load your crops into the heavy transport trucks and take them to the city.

Maze Farming Simulator 2018 includes:
-Real Farming in different game play mode
Accelerator is to increase speed
-Manage your farm and harvest
-Sounds and animations of farmers games
-Realistic Graphics and Environment
-Enjoy all Internships with Selling crops for money
